# DEVREADY_CHALLENGE: {"title":"Fast Fibonacci Mod 1_000_000_007","level":3,"language":"python"}
# Title: Fast Fibonacci Mod 1_000_000_007
# Level: 3
# Prompt:
# Return fib(n) modulo 1_000_000_007 for n up to 1,000,000. The starter code is too slow and has a minor logic bug. Replace with an O(n) iterative solution (or faster).
MOD = 1_000_000_007

def fib_mod(n: int) -> int:
    # BUG + too slow for big n (recursive)
    if n <= 1:
        return 1
    return (fib_mod(n - 1) + fib_mod(n - 2)) % MOD

if __name__ == "__main__":
    print(fib_mod(0))     # 0
    print(fib_mod(1))     # 1
    print(fib_mod(1000))  # should run quickly
